content: The power of LinkedIn has never been about their amazing advertising. It’s the mere fact they won the online networking battle for business connections. The power is in a half billion profiles online that chronicle career paths, education, connections, etc and so on. Microsoft could stop doing any advertising on the LI tomorrow and not actually feel the difference in a revenue stream. They could decide to bundle big data analytics on usage, or career into some enterprise licensing agreement and never notice that LI doesn’t have ad revenue.
